title: Bulk Edit Product Weights for Shipping
description: A logistics manager realizes the weights for an entire product line were entered incorrectly, affecting shipping cost calculations. They need to perform a bulk update.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all products within a specific category or brand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves all products from 'Brand Y'.

tasks.description: Export the product list with SKUs and current weights to a CSV file.
After the manager corrects the weights in the CSV, import the file to bulk update the product information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the corrected data, updating the weights for all products in the list.
